name: qCleanup
author: Ognjen Kuljic

sections.description:
Some very useful plugins like Regenerate Thumbnails leaves old files behind, so it is good practice to clean after it.

Features:
*Remove all unused files from upload dir (Unattached files to posts or pages),
*Remove all leftover files (forgotten files in upload dir).
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload q-cleanup.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Unzip archive.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Navigate to ‘Settings’ -> ‘Q Cleanup’ menu
  5. Clean up!
sections.faq:
What about foo bar?

Answer to foo bar dilemma.

short_description: This plugin allows you to delete unused and leftover files from upload dir. In one click you can rid of all unwanted files and reduce space usage.
description:
Some very useful plugins like Regenerate Thumbnails leaves old files behind, so it is good practice to clean after it.

Features:
*Remove all unused files from upload dir (Unattached files to posts or pages),
*Remove all leftover files (forgotten files in upload dir).
